last_episode_to_air.name: Another Bride, Another Groom
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the day before Norman and Chrissy's wedding and Mildred is upset that she has not received an invitation...

name: Man About the House
overview: Sitcom exploring the trials and tribulations created by one man and two women flat-sharing in the 70s.

episodes.name: Three's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Chrissy and Jo throw a farewell party for their flatmate, who's getting engaged and moving out. Next morning, they find Robin asleep in their bath. They're looking for a new flatmate and he is looking for somewhere to live, so the girls ask him to stay, but will their landlords, the Ropers, agree to the new arrangement ?

episodes.name: And Mother Makes Four
episodes.overview: Chrissy's mother is about to pay a visit. She doesn't know Robin is living in the flat, so he's told to make himself scarce, but as she's staying the night, where will he sleep ?

episodes.name: Some Enchanted Evening
episodes.overview: Jo's new boyfriend is coming to the flat for a meal. Robin is persuaded to cook, then leave with Chrissy to spend the evening playing monopoly with the Ropers. They learn that Jo's boyfriend is Jewish - and Robin has cooked roast pork for their meal!

episodes.name: And Then There Were Two
episodes.overview: Chrissy is very nervous when Jo goes away for the weekend and leaves her alone in the flat with Robin. He brings a woman back, but Chrissy becomes jealous...

episodes.name: It's Only Money
episodes.overview: The rent is due and the money put aside to pay it has disappeared from the flat. Robin, Chrissy and Jo have to find a way of getting some cash quickly.

episodes.name: Match of the Day
episodes.overview: Robin has been picked to play in a college football match. A few days before the game, he goes down with a bad cold. Chrissy and Jo rally round in an attempt to help him to recover in time to play.

episodes.name: No Children, No Dogs
episodes.overview: Robin acquires a puppy. The lease on the flat says 'no pets', so Roper mustn't find out.

episodes.name: While the Cat's Away
episodes.overview: Robin, Chrissy and Jo take advantage of the Ropers being away by having a party!

episodes.name: Colour Me Yellow
episodes.overview: Robin loses his self-esteem after being unable to defend himself to a mean Irishman at the pub. Chrissy and Jo try to make him feel better, but he decides he will take on the guy the next time he sees him...

episodes.name: In Praise of Older Men
episodes.overview: Chrissy goes on a date with her new boyfriend. Robin, however, learns that he is married, and tries to stop the date before it becomes a total disaster.

episodes.name: Did You Ever Meet Rommel ?
episodes.overview: Mr. Roper has had a grudge against Germans since the war. Chrissy makes the mistake of inviting him over for a meal with Robin and his German friend, Franz...

episodes.name: Two Foot Two, Eyes of Blue
episodes.overview: Jo is going on a date with Philip, but has forgotten that she is meant to be babysitting. Chrissy agrees to take her place and persuades Robin to come along, but when they arrive, it looks as if he is going to regret his decision as the TV is being repaired and the drinks cabinet is locked.

episodes.name: Carry Me Back to Old Southampton
episodes.overview: Robin has failed his cooking exams! It seems he might have to move back  to Southampton to work for his father. Larry prepares to move in, as Robin prepares to move out!

episodes.name: Cuckoo in the Nest
episodes.overview: Larry drives everyone crazy while living in the flat. Robin, Chrissy and Jo try to find him a place to stay, but where to look ?

episodes.name: Come into My Parlour
episodes.overview: Chrissy is upset when Robin begins a relationship with an old friend of hers.

episodes.name: I Won't Dance, Don't Ask Me
episodes.overview: Robin doesn't fit in at Chrissy and Jo's work party.

episodes.name: Of Mice and Women
episodes.overview: A mouse invades Chrissy and Jo's bedroom and Robin uses this to his advantage!

episodes.name: Somebody Out There Likes Me
episodes.overview: Chrissy receives flowers and chocolates from a secret admirer. She gives them to Mildred, who uses them to make George jealous, assuming that Mildred has a secret admirer.

episodes.name: We Shall Not Be Moved
episodes.overview: Mildred leaves for the weekend. George takes advantage of this by trying to trick Robin, Chrissy and Jo into leaving the flat.

episodes.name: Three of a Kind
episodes.overview: Chrissy replaces Robin in a poker game while he is away getting his tonsils removed. All she has to do now is learn how to play the game!

episodes.name: Home & Away
episodes.overview: Robin, Chrissy and Jo are using Roper's car to watch a football match, but it breaks down. They call in for advice hoping that George won't find out, but there he is in the pub showing off his new wig.

episodes.name: One for the Road
episodes.overview: Chrissy takes driving lessons from Robin and George makes some incredibly strong homebrew liquor...

episodes.name: All in the Game
episodes.overview: Robin has to spend the night with Roper while his friend, Jerry, rids his flat of woodworm.

episodes.name: Never Give Your Real Name
episodes.overview: Robin is in a lot of trouble after Larry uses his name on a date. Can Robin resolve his problem with Linda?

episodes.name: The Tender Trap
episodes.overview: Chrissy's mother visits the flat again, intent on getting her daughter together with Robin.

episodes.name: My Son, My Son
episodes.overview: The Inland Revenue are investigating George for tax irregularities and come round to talk to him and his son, whom he invented for financial gain...

episodes.name: The Last Picture Show
episodes.overview: Larry decides to use Chrissy's cine camera and projector for a 'special' type of film...

episodes.name: Right Said George
episodes.overview: George has a hard time getting the piano he sold to Robin upstairs.

episodes.name: A Little Knowledge
episodes.overview: Robin gets a job as a door-to-door encyclopedia salesman, and needs some help.

episodes.name: Love and Let Love
episodes.overview: While the flatmates compete to get the flat to themselves to entertain friends, George is trying to find jobs to avoid Mildred.

episodes.name: How Does Your Garden Grow?
episodes.overview: Robin, Chrissy, and Jo are cleaning the Ropers' garden. They discover a plant and decide to keep it, that is until Larry identifies it as cannabis...

episodes.name: Come Fly with Me
episodes.overview: Chrissy gets some tickets to see Frank Sinatra in concert - she doesn't want them, but Jo and Robin certainly do! Also, it is George and Mildred's anniversary.

episodes.name: The Party's Over
episodes.overview: Robin and Chrissy's party is cancelled by George, which leads to a dispute. It gets so bad that Mildred finally leaves him. Can George get Mildred back?

episodes.name: One More for the Pot
episodes.overview: Roper raises the rent, and the flatmates need to find a fourth roomie to help pay it off.

episodes.name: The Generation Game
episodes.overview: To please Mildred Roper, Robin goes on a dancing date with her while George decides to stay at home. However, George things something might happen between the two.

episodes.name: The Sunshine Boys
episodes.overview: George needs some money so he sells Mildred's sun lamp to Larry, who sells it to Robin. Later, when Mildred is upstairs, she sees her lamp and thinks Robin has stolen it...

episodes.name: Mum Always Liked You Best
episodes.overview: Robin's brother Norman comes to stay for two days, and he takes a shine to Chrissy...

episodes.name: Fire Down Below
episodes.overview: George receives a huge gas bill and decides to open up his chimney, but it needs to be swept so he gets a gadget from Jerry to suck out the soot. Meanwhile, things have moved on considerably with Norman and Chrissy, which makes Robin jealous...

episodes.name: Another Bride, Another Groom
episodes.overview: It's the day before Norman and Chrissy's wedding and Mildred is upset that she has not received an invitation...
